  /model to try Opus 4.5

❯ Create a file called test.txt with the content: Hello World

⏺ Write(test.txt)
  ⎿  Wrote 1 lines to test.txt
      1 Hello World

⏺ Done! I've created test.txt with the content "Hello World" in your current
  working directory.

❯ Edit test.txt and change Hello to Goodbye

⏺ Read 1 file (ctrl+o to expand)

⏺ Update(test.txt)

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

 1 -Hello World
 1   No newline at end of file
 2 +Goodbye World
 3   No newline at end of file
